entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: SSW 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
